title: I lost my chest and key
body:
I opened chest and i didnt get anything,so i relogged and my chest and key was gone.
Can someone help?

replies.body: It's likely that your connection was able to process the transaction, but the animation may not occurred.  I took a look into this to see what happened!  I was able to verify that you received 150 Orange essences as well as a Power Up Summoner Icon, very cool!  The icon was automatically unlocked so you can see it in your icon selection screen.  Let me know if that clears things up!.
I didn't get anything yet. Nevermind,anyway ty for trying. :)

Odd, I'm able to see it on your account.  Can you provide a screenshot of your summoner icon options?  What happens if you try the legacy client?

-  On the login screen of the open beta updated client, look for the "Launch Legacy Client" text at the bottom.
-  Or create a shortcut directly to the legacy client in your League Installation. Just look for "lol.launcher" 

Let me know.
Yup,icon showed up after last game.Ty alot. :)
